body_html:
thank you for your suggestions,
I updated cudnn to v7, cuda 8, pytorch 0.3 (pip) and set cudnn.benchmark = True,
With benchmark = True, I can process larger inputs than without it. However with even larger inputs I again face the same error message.
body_text:
thank you for your suggestions,

body:
thank you for your suggestions, 
I updated cudnn to v7, cuda 8, pytorch 0.3 (pip)  and set cudnn.benchmark = True, 
With benchmark = True, I can process larger inputs than without it. However with even larger inputs I again face the same error message.
